content.question: Which of the following statements most accurately describes chord 2 ?

choices.label: It is a root position dominant seventh chord with the fifth omitted.
It is an inverted seventh chord that prolongs the tonic between ⅰ and ⅰ6.
The chordal seventh is approached by an ascending leap.
All voices move in similar motion into chord 2.

content.answer: It is an inverted seventh chord that prolongs the tonic between ⅰ and ⅰ6.
